CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Event_Start_Date__c) , CASE(Event_Start_Month__c, "01", "January ", "02", "February ", "03", "March ", "04", "April ", "05", "May ", "06", "June ", "07", "July ", "08", "August ", "09", "September ", "10", "October ", "11", "November ", "12", "December ", "ERROR" ) & TEXT(Event_Start_Day__c) & ", " & TEXT(Event_Start_Year__c) & " " & TEXT( Event_Start_Hour__c) & ":" & TEXT(Event_Start_Minute__c ) & " " & " [" & RIGHT( TEXT(Timezone__c) , LEN((TEXT(Timezone__c))) - 12)&"]",
CASE( MONTH(Event_Start_Date__c) , 1, "January ", 2, "February ", 3, "March ", 4, "April ", 5, "May ", 6, "June ", 7, "July ", 8, "August ", 9, "September ", 10, "October ", 11, "November ", 12, "December ", "ERROR" ) & TEXT(DAY(Event_Start_Date__c))&", "& TEXT(YEAR(Event_Start_Date__c))&" "& LEFT(TEXT(Event_Start_Time__c), 5) &" "& " [" & RIGHT( TEXT(Timezone__c) , LEN((TEXT(Timezone__c))) - 12)&"]")
CustomField.label: Human-readable Event Start
